Room.Name: Cellar of the Dwarven Drinking Society
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the cellar of a fraternal order of dwarves.
Room.LongDescription: The room is dark, but there is a door at the top of some stairs where light seeps around the edges. The door is only slightly over a meter tall however, so you conclude some very short people probably use this room. The smell of rum is quite strong and you are a little sickened by its overpowering odor in such a small place. There is a new padlock on the side door. A broken window leads to a vault in the alley outside.
